tweets: Every president has to cut their own path.  @KamalaHarris  perspective on how to solve our countrys problems is fresh and new. Donald Trumps perspective is old, failed, and thoroughly dishonest.

As difficult as these past days have been, weve seen incredible courage from so many Americans coming togetherfirst responders, friends, families, and neighbors looking out for one another.  To all the people impacted by Hurricanes Milton and Helene: Weve got your back.

To everyone impacted by Hurricane Milton: I urge you stay inside and off the roads.  Downed power lines, debris, and road washouts are creating dangerous conditions.  Help is on the way, but until it arrives, shelter in place until your local officials say its safe to go out.
Governor DeSantis and Mayor Castor  if you need any additional resources as we prepare for Hurricane Milton to make landfall, you give me a call.  Were here for you as long as it takes.

You cant only help those in need if they voted for you.  Its the most basic part of being president, and this guy knows nothing about it.
